song_lyrics: Akṣharne sāthe lāvyā, Akṣharne sāthe lāvyā,
Aishvaryo sāthe lāvyā, aishvaryo sāthe lāvyā,
Bhavyam bhavya kāryo kīdhā, bhītar bharī divyātā,
Divyam divya paramparā nīrakhī chhe Pramukh Swāmīmā,
Alaukik kāryo saghaḷā Pramukh Swāmī āpaṇā...
Rom rom Parabrahma birāje, vilase pūrṇa divyatā,
Sparshe āpane kautuk janme, nīkhare pūraṇ bhavyatā,
Aho aho ā bhavyatā, aho aho ā divyatā,
E Parabrahma Puruṣhottam Akṣharmā vichare chhe,
Bhavyatā divyatā Akṣhar Pramukhjī, āpane sahaj chhe,
Pūrṇa bhavyam pūrṇa divyam, Pramukh Swāmī sarvakāryam
Pūrṇa divya Parabrahmathī paripūrṇa āpaṇu jīvan,
Pūrṇa divya Parabrahmathī paripūrṇa āpaṇu sarjan,
Pūrṇa divya Parabrahma jevā ahoniṣh apaṇu vicharaṇ,
Pūrṇa divya Parabrahma swarūp Pramukhjīne vandan,
Pūrna divya Parabrahmathī paripūrṇa āpaṇu jīvan,
Pūrṇa bhavyam pūrṇa divyam, sarva kāraṇam Pramukh Swāmī,
title: Parabrahma Swāminārāyaṇ Akṣharadhāmse avatarī

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1160: unknown

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
